Hello ladies and gentlemen! Today we formalize bride and groom to wedding, we hope everyone will have nothing to say to discontinue this relationship!


1. Your Partner must be your friend : /friendinvite
2. Target your partner and use .engage
3. Press I want to Marry
4. You can use .gotolove for teleporting to your partner, it request for your partner to not move while teleporting!
Wedding price: 250,000,000 Adena
